titleStmt.title: An analysis of the I. Timoth. I. 15. and an appendix, which may be called Chronologia vapulans. / By Laurence Sarson, Batchelour in Divinity and Fellow of Immanuel Colledge.
titleStmt.author: Sarson, Laurence, fl. 1643-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel, printer to the University.,

notesStmt.note: With two final errata leaves, the first with caption title "Inserenda", the second with caption title "Corrigenda".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
